segments.text: It has a receiver , a CD player , a double cassette deck , and a turntable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , let me take a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The CD player is a three-disk player . Here , we'll put a disk in so you can check out the sound . ( He puts a CD into the CD player . )
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds pretty good . I see the equalizer has a good selection of settings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can also play Ccds on it if you hook it up to your TV .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . This system seems to have everything I'm looking for . It's a bit pricey , though . I'll have to think about it . Thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Hope to see you again soon .
segments.speaker: S1
